title: Can't buy a mystery skin
body: I've bought one before, but now can't find it in the store. Any suggestions?

replies.body: do what i do and buy one for a friend, and in turn have them buy one for you. It's essentially the same thing so long as you both wanted a mystery skin

Hey tfoxt,

Sorry to hear that, but Mystery Skins aren't always available for purchase. Make sure to follow the Sales page to see when we've announced the availability of Mystery Skins:

- http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales

If you're referring to the "Worlds Big Plays Sales" in the "Welcome to the Worlds Shop" announcement, it's referring to Mystery Gifts--sent to your friends instead of purchasing it for yourself.

- http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-worlds-shop
